Posts.EditableText:
Hi everyone! I'm new here and I've been following the tutorial for text adventures for tips on what to do, but I've altogether been making a game unique to the one described in the tutorial. I am using the browser version.
I've had two major issues so far, with the most annoying on being when I select the "if" script, I am given no "then" header underneath it, only the "add else" and "add else if" options.
Additionally, I have followed all instructions on creating an in-game map, but when I go to play the game, no map is generated. This is less urgent, but still takes away from my game.
Any help is much appreciated!
Posts.HTML:
Hi everyone! I'm new here and I've been following the tutorial for text adventures for tips on what to do, but I've altogether been making a game unique to the one described in the tutorial. I am using the browser version.
I've had two major issues so far, with the most annoying on being when I select the "if" script, I am given no "then" header underneath it, only the "add else" and "add else if" options.
Additionally, I have followed all instructions on creating an in-game map, but when I go to play the game, no map is generated. This is less urgent, but still takes away from my game.
Any help is much appreciated!

Posts.EditableText: I swear i never seen it happening. Internet connection? Try to reload? I strongly recommend you download the program if you can.
Posts.HTML: I swear i never seen it happening. Internet connection? Try to reload? I strongly recommend you download the program if you can.

Posts.EditableText: Oh! Ok. Got it. The first part is the IF condition. Then comes the Add New Script just above the "If". There is where you place what will be the "Then".
Posts.HTML: Oh! Ok. Got it. The first part is the IF condition. Then comes the Add New Script just above the "If". There is where you place what will be the "Then".

Posts.EditableText: Are you sure you activated the "Map and drawing" at the Game "features"?
Posts.HTML: Are you sure you activated the "Map and drawing" at the Game "features"?

Posts.EditableText: The map feature does not work if you are working online.
Posts.HTML: The map feature does not work if you are working online.
